subject: In search of an SMTP protocol testing Suite
msgSnippet: Hello all, I ve looked over the junit.org site and I ve searched around on the web, but I m coming up empty handed. I m interested in developing a set of rfc
messageBody:
Hello all,

I've looked over the junit.org site and I've searched around on the web, but
I'm coming up empty handed. I'm interested in developing a set of rfc spec
junit tests for protocols like SMTP (so that I can use them on the
jakarta-james mail server project), but I thought someone might already have
invented that wheel before me. My research hasn't turned anything up, if
anyone knows about an existing set of SMTP tests I would be really
interested in them.

Thanks in advance,
Kenny Smith
JournalScape.com
